original_text: And Aaron spake all the words which the Lord had spoken unto Moses, and did the signs in the sight of the people.
korean_text: 아론이 여호와께서 모세에게 이르신 모든 말씀을 전하고 그 백성 앞에서 이적을 행하니

sentences.original_text: And Aaron spake all the words
which the Lord had spoken unto Moses
in the sight of the people
